===Transaction fees===
===Transaction fees===
â
Because nodes have no obligation to include transactions in the blocks they generate, Bitcoin senders may voluntarily pay a transaction fee. Doing so might speed up the transaction as it provides an incentive for miners to include it in a block. It might also slow down the transaction as it provides an incentive to not broadcast a lucrative transaction. Miners collect the transaction fees associated with all transactions included in blocks they solve.<ref name=lwn />
+
Because nodes have no obligation to include transactions in the blocks they generate, Bitcoin senders may voluntarily pay a transaction fee. Doing so might speed up the transaction as it provides an incentive for miners to include it in a block. It might also slow down the transaction as it provides an incentive to not broadcast a lucrative transaction{{fact}}. Miners collect the transaction fees associated with all transactions included in blocks they solve.<ref name=lwn />
